net.edzard.kinetic

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • net.edzard.kinetic.Node
        • net.edzard.kinetic.Container
          • net.edzard.kinetic.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends Container
    A layer object. Layers contain nodes. Multiple layers can be assigned to a stage. Each will be drawn individually and combined into a single overall drawing. By restricting shapes to certain layers, update operations can be kept to a minimum, which is good for performance.
    Author:
    Ed

      • getThrottle

        public final int getThrottle()
        Retrieves the throttle value for animations on this layer object. The throttle value influences how often drawing operations are executed.
        Returns:
        The throttle value in milliseconds.
